title: Meta turns to Google’s Gemini to power its ad business despite $600B AI Bet
description: Meta has poured billions into artificial intelligence, but it may soon rely on Google to run one of its most critical businesses. title: Amazon loses VP helping lead development of artificial general intelligence
description: An Amazon vice president helping to oversee one of the company's highest profile projects, artificial general intelligence, is stepping down on Friday, the online retailer confirmed after a Reuters inquiry.
content:
Karthik Ramakrishnan, a 13-year veteran of Amazon, is stepping down, according to internal communications reviewed by Reuters. It could not be learned if he had another job lined up and Ramakrishnan did not respond to a request for comment.
Sign up h... [1735 chars]

title: Amazon loses VP helping lead development of artificial general intelligence
description: Ramakrishnan worked on the first iteration of Amazon's Alexa voice assistant and the associated Echo devices. He began his career at Netscape before moving to Tellme Networks, which was acquired by Microsoft, according to his LinkedIn profile.

title: Anthropic to triple international workforce as AI models drive growth outside US
description: Anthropic said on Friday it plans to triple its international workforce and expand its applied artificial intelligence team by fivefold this year to meet a surge in demand for its Claude AI models outside the United States.
content:
Sept 26 (Reuters) - Anthropic said on Friday it plans to triple its international workforce and expand its applied artificial intelligence team by fivefold this year to meet a surge in demand for its Claude AI models outside the United States.

title: Trump Says Yes to Elon Musk's Grok for Federal Agencies - For 42 Cents, How Can It Help the US Government?
description: Elon Musk's Grok received the approval of the General Services Administration (GSA). This will allow federal agencies to use the artificial intelligence. But, for what?

title: AI used to predict the toll of concussions on student athletes over time
description: Researchers at the University of Michigan are using artificial intelligence to predict the health consequences that sport-related concussions might have on student athletes over the course of their college athletic careers.
content:

title: Optogenetics and artificial intelligence open path to personalized Parkinson’s treatment
description: Globally recognized figures like Muhammad Ali and Michael J. Fox have long suffered from Parkinson's disease. The disease presents a complex set of motor symptoms, including tremors, rigidity, bradykinesia, and postural instability.
